headline: Walker & Dunlop Arranges $867 Million Financing Package for the Largest Single-Building, Office-to-Residential Conversion in the U.S.
summary: BETHESDA, Md., December 22, 2025--Walker & Dunlop, Inc. announced today that it has arranged a $778.6 million construction loan to facilitate the office-to-residential conversion of 111 Wall Street, located along the East River waterfront in Lower Manhattan’s Financial District. The closing of this financing marks the largest single-building office-to-residential conversion loan in New York City history, and the country.
